channel.title: Making the server change a setting in the client?
channel.description: What I need is for example, when you first log in the "Auto Retaliate" button is set to on, how would I set it up to where, if the player set it to off when he logged off, it would still be set to off when he logs back in?

item.title: Making the server change a setting in the client?
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

[quote=“tyb97, post:5, topic:463259”]I know how to do it, plus that wouldn’t help seeing as I’m using a deob client…[/quote]You don’t have to refer to it directly, just use it as a reference.

Read full topic

item.title: Making the server change a setting in the client?
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

RiiPiiNFtW:

That is a client thing all by itself. Make a config file for the client to read off upon initialization and if true stay on blah blah

Only issue with that is, what if something somehow goes out of sync? I guess I could use a packet to keep it sync’d with the server…

Read full topic
